TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ObjectAccessRule extends System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule

Docs.summary: Represents a combination of a user's identity, an access mask, and an access control type (allow or deny). An ObjectAccessRule object also contains information about the type of object to which the rule applies, the type of child object that can inherit the rule, how the rule is inherited by child objects, and how that inheritance is propagated.
